1.content:
Bobby Thomson stood outside of the two story house as his parents sped away towards the airport. He knocks on the door twice, and not even a second passes before Aunt Marla, his mother's slightly younger sister, opens the door, with her sholder cut blond and gray hair flowing, and he perfect teeth shining bright in Bobby's face,

"Bobby, it is so nice to see you!" Aunt Marla exclaims as she gives you a hug. Bobby gives an annoyed look, but responds in that fake joyfulness that every teenager knows.

"Yes, Good to see you too."

"We are going to have such a great time for this week."

Yeah, Great. Bobby thinks. He didn't mind his Aunt, but he didn't know how he would handle her for a week.

"Why don't you drop your bags into the guest room?"

Bobby nods and heads to the mysterious guest room. Of all the times he had been here, he had never stepped foot into it. And when he entered, he found it surprisingly bland. The room almost looked as if it was easily adaptable, but he brushed off this feeling and put his bags onto the bed. He looked at the clock. 9:43. Man, he got here late. He would have a quick snack with Marla before he headed to bed. He was extremely tired.

In his brief time eating, he found that his Uncle would be out of commision for the week as well, as he was out on a golfing trip through the southwestern USA. Great. It was just Bobby and Marla for the rest of the week. Bobby quickly excused himself and was in bed by 10:30. He couldn't imagine how boring this week would be.

If only he knew. What will Bobby's first transformation be?
1.title: Bobby's arrival and heading to bed.

choices: He wakes up as a dog
He wakes up as a mix between the two
111.content: Another Question: Will he wake up as a dog or still physically a human?
111.title: Dog

1111.content: What breed of dog does Bobby wake up as?
1111.title: He wakes up as a dog

choices: Laura takes me for a walk in the park
Laura takes me back to her bedroom
11113.content:
After settling in Aunt Marla's guestroom, I decide to go to bed and catch up on some well deserved sleep. My mind wonders on what the following five days are going to hold in store for me. "Oh to only not have any worries and just let come what may" I say aloud as I drift off. As sleep overcomes me I begin to dream of a life with no worries, just playing carefree with no responsibilities. I dream of being taken care of, running free through the neighborhood park and letting someone else make all the decisions for me. A life of unbridled abandonment.

Upon wakening in Aunt Marla's guestroom I feel strange, not sure of how long I have slept. As I stretch out with my usual morning yawn I notice my body responds oddly. Try as I may I feel my arms and legs, in fact my entire body no longer responds the way it should.

"I must be tangled in the bed sheets" I say to myself only to hear "arff arff arff arff arff" in response. "What the heck?" I ask myself as I roll out of bed and fall a dizzying height to the floor.

I shake my head and try to stand, only to find myself down on all fours. Wondering what just happened I take a look at myself only to see the fury pink body of a dog in place of my human form. A serge of adrenaline runs through my body as I panic realizing I have in fact become a dog!

I scamper across the room to the full length mirror and gaze in amazement. Looking back at me is the reflection of a puny, pink French Poodle, complete with the funky hair cut. My mouth drops and to my dismay the toy poodle dog's reflection also drops it's mouth. "Oh damn! That's ME!" I realize.

A knock comes to the door as it opens slowly. Aunt Marla walks in wearing her robe and looks down at me smiling.

"Well good morning Bobby." she greets me while bending down and fastening a collar around my neck attached to a leather leash. "I trust you slept well, and are probably wondering what happened that you are now a dog. A silly little French Poodle I might add." Aunt Marla laughs.

"Come" Aunt Marla commands as she tugs my leash and leads me through her house into the kitchen. I am so puny I am only knee height to Aunt Marla. She then prepares a double bowl of dog food and water and places it under the table. "Go ahead, eat up Bobby" Aunt Marla smiled.

Somehow, I can't quite explain how, I had to obey Aunt Marla and quickly started eating away at the bowl of foul tasting dog food as she sat down and enjoyed her morning cup of tea.

"It's like this Bobby, for what ever reason my guestroom transforms whomsoever sleeps and dreams in there into what they wish to be based on their desires. You're not the first guest I have had in there. In fact, I am wearing two of my previous guests right now." Aunt Marla stands up and opens her robe to reveal her very alluring body clad in only a bra and panties. "Yes, both my bra and panties were former male guests I had over. Now they are my everyday underwear. It's what they dreamed of, what they desire, so now it's what they are."

I gaze up from under the table at Aunt Marla's incredible body. At first I was astonished at how snug her bra and panties fit, especially around her enormous breasts and tight waist, when I notice that her bra and panties are actually moving, hugging and caressing as it were her porn star actress type body. It is with both horror and fascination that I realized her bra and panties were actual living beings. Aunt Marla closed her robe and sat back down, "Eat" she commanded me and I eagerly feasted on my bowl of dog food.

"From my experiences so far I have figured out this. You can change back or into something else as long as you return to my guestroom and fall asleep before midnight of the same day. If you do not, well let's just say you end up in a permanent position such as my underwear. They are stuck being my bra and panties forever. You on the other hand have four more days of transformations possible for you; but remember on the last night, before your parents take you home, you have to think and dream of being yourself as a human again. Or else who knows what you may end up being." Aunt Marla laughs again.

"While you dream, I in my room see your dreams. It's how I knew to show up with a leash and collar." Aunt Marla smiles down at me. "And since your parents, namely my sister forced me into this baby sitting, and neither you or I am into insest, I have arranged a special friend to stop by to help me watch over you."

Just then the doorbell rang, instinctively I yelped "arff arff arff" and ran towards the front door only to be stopped in my tracks by a tug on my collar by Aunt Marla. "Heel!" she yells down to me and I instinctively obey.

Aunt Marla opens the front door and as I look up I see to my dismay her next door neighbor, my classmate and the school's female geek and outcast Laura whom I personally have teased to no end.

"Hello Aunt Marla" Laura hugs my aunt. Laura looks down at me with an evil grin. "Hello Bobby" and laughs out loud. "So this is the dog I am to babysit today" Laura questions Aunt Marla.

"Yes he is Laura. Please take good care of him and have him back well before midnight or else he'll be stuck as a dog" Aunt Marla giggled. "And may I add, YOUR DOG if that should happen."

"Oh he's in good hands" Laura laughs evilly.
11113.title: Aunt Marla's Toy French Poodle

choices: "Job well done.  Let's get you back to your aunt's."
"This cash is too good to pass up, I'm keeping you like this."
111131.content:
"You may be wondering why I'm doing this." Laura says while practically dragging you on your leash. Honestly you could care less about her motivations, just so long as you were back in your aunt's guest room by midnight. "You see Bobby, as much fun as leading you around on a leash is, it's not my sole motivation. I'm actually attempting to start a nice little dog training business on the side, but it's an awfully hard business to start up out of the blue. Owners want trainers with 'experience' and what better way than to show off my neighbor's well trained french poodle." Laura stopped and looked me dead in the eyes. "And if the poodle isn't well trained, then I guess I'll just have to take him and send him off to some kennel to spend the rest of his miserable doggy days. Do we understand each other?"

Standing there absolutely terrified I just nodded my doggy head and gave a quick little yip. I have absolutely no plan to be stuck as a freaking french poodle for the rest of my life. "Good," Laura said giving you a way too hard tug at the leash, "Let's go meet my client in the park."

Getting walked to the park it just feels like every pair of eyes is on me and it feels like every one of them can sense my embarrassment. I'm sure they are just taking a glance at the dog with the funny hair cut, but every look felt like a dagger of humiliation. If just being on the leash wasn't bad enough, at a crosswalk Laura started walking with and chatting up some dog walker guy for a while, and it felt like every single one of the dogs he was with just had to get a sniff of your ass. I kept trying to keep away from them but Laura kept dragging me back to the pack. Finally after what felt like a lifetime we reached the park and Laura directed me towards an older woman with her own poodle, this one a bit bigger than me.

"Hello Mrs. Wright. I'm ready for my demonstration."

"Hello Laura, and this is?"

"Fifi" Laura said smiling down at me after I let out a low whimper at being christened with such a...lame name.

"Absolutely adorable, not as fine as my Champ, but still a fine dog. Why don't you show me what your training can do."

"Very well, we'll start with the basics. Sit." Taking the cue from Laura I immediately sit back on my back legs.
"Shake." I reached a paw out for Laura to hold.
"Roll over." This isn't too bad I think as I rolled on the ground.

"All very basic, but what puts you above other trainers?"

"Oh I can make this dog do things you've never seen another dog do." Laura went over to a puddle of mud, moss, and filth and stomped a foot in it and walked back over to me.

"Lick it clean." Excuse me I think to yourself looking up at her with my little doggy eyes making sure I heard her right.
"Lick. It. Clean." Laura said again with a malicious tone in her voice.

Knowing I didn't have any choice in the matter if I wanted to turn back, licked all of the disgusting crap from her shoe, trying not to gag with each lick. Can this get any worse?

"I'm impressed! Do you have any more?"

"Why yes he can. Fifi! Kiss Champ."

Yes it can. I thought as I took a walk of shame over to the larger poodle who seemed to be giving me a look over. Before I could give it a second thought I cocked my neck up and licked Champ right on the nose. In return I got a slew of licks back and my backside got sniffed, thankfully this seemed to amuse Mrs. Wright enough to end the demonstration.

"Fantastic work! Bravo! You can start next weekend. Here is your agreed advanced payment." Mrs. Wright said excitedly

"Thank you very much." Laura said greedily taking the cash. As soon as the old lady and her dog were out of sight Laura looked at you and said,
111131.title: Laura takes me for a walk in the park

choices: She notices and lets you out
You have to go in the house
111132.content: Laura takes me back to her house and leads me into the bedroom. While on the way there, I've had time to notice that she's gotten a lot better looking since the last time I saw her. When we get back to the bedroom, she sits on her bed and looks at me. "I know you're admiring me and my body. It was part of my plan to get some revenge on you. Taunt you with this but never let you have it." At that I felt my ears droop slightly. "But this is better than I could've imagined." She gets up and walks out to the kitchen. She pulls out of the fridge... Oh, my God! It's a bone from a T-bone steak! I want it, I want it! Laura laughs as she dangles it above me. I jump and jump but can't reach it. C'mon lemme have it! Look, I'll do tricks for you! I spin, sit, stand, but she still won't give it to me. After a while of me desperately showing how much I want it, she finally drops it. I take the bone to the other room. She's not gonna take it back now! She just laughs a little and then goes to watch TV. I have fun gnawing on my bone but after a while, I realize I need to go! I go straight to Laura, the only person in the immediate vicinity who can take me out. I go to her and try to let her know that I need to go outside.
111132.title: Laura takes me back to her bedroom

choices: Marla is calm because she thinks Bobby is a dog.
Marla is calm because she knew this was going to happen.
Marla is shocked, she doesn't know what's going on.
1112.content:
Bobby fluttered his eyes open after a good night's sleep, and instantly noticed something was wrong. He was on his stomach. Yes, he normally tossed and turned throughout the night, but he never actually woke up on his stomach. As he got himself oriented with the real world again, he almost screamed when he saw other changes.

His bed had completely transformed from the normal white bed he had fallen asleep in the night before into a giant Doggie Bed. As he looked around the room, boxes of dog treats and bones and chew toys were littered around the room. And then Bobby then realized he was completely naked except for a dog collar around his neck.

What was going on? This couldn't have been a prank by his aunt, because she wouldn't have the time for it nor would she want to. Bobby had never before beleived in magic or the supernatural, but really, there was no other explination. He certainly wasn't dreaming. He never dreams.

Suddenly. Bobby hears his door starting to open. It is Marla who is creaking his door. Bobby awaits the reaction of his aunt. This could be interesting, he thinks.
1112.title: He wakes up Human

choices: Marla decides to take Bobby for a walk
11121.content:
"Good morning Buddy!" Marla says in that goofy, babyish tone that every dog lover talks in. "Did You get a good sleep? Does my little doggie love to sleep? Yes he does!"

At this point, Marla comes over to Bobby and starts to pet his head. For some odd reason, Bobby felt really happy when she started to do this. In his mind, Bobby decided that his aunt had been effected by whatever was effecting him too. She wouldn't be able to act like this if she had done something to him, and she is not that great of an actor either. Lost in his thought, Bobby snapped back to realize that he was panting. Like a Dog. Great, Bobby thought, now there were mental changes too.

"Ready for Breakfast?" Marla said to Bobby. Bobby followed Marla upstairs to the dining room, where he saw what he was afraid of. A large bowl of dog food and a bowl of water waiting for him. He had no choice, he thought. Marla was expecting him to eat. Marla went to the table to eat her eggs, while Bobby slowly got onto the floor and walked towards the bowl. Bobby, by some instinct, started to sniff the food.

Within three minutes, Bobby had licked the bowl clean. During the meal he had discovered that his tounge was now long and flat, and it helped him to more easily eat his meal. Bobby actually became somewhat worried that he had enjoyed the meal so much. He didn't want to become a dog.
11121.title: Marla is calm because she thinks Bobby is a dog.

What was worst, he didnt run on two legs but on all 4s. Bobby then proceeded to bark like a dog but humanly. His aunt then opened the door and on the other side was...

1112122121.content:
As Bobby continued to bark, not truly realizing what he was doing, Marla came and opened the door. Behind it was a woman Marla's age with her blonde hair in a ponytail and wearing jogging clothes. Alongside her on a leash was a German Shepherd, sitting there like any well trained dog. Bobby couldn't help himself, as he jumped onto the woman's sholders and started to lick her face.

"Down, Buddy! Hahahaha!" The woman laughed as her dog barked at her side.

"Buddy! Sit!" Marla commanded sternly. Bobby obliged, and sat in the same position that the German Shepherd had just did. Only then did Bobby realize what he had done, but no matter how hard he tried, he couldn't stop himself from acting the way he was.

"Hi Jenny, thanks for coming." Marla said with a smile. "And hello Spike!" Marla petted the German Shepherd, as Spike moved forward.

"Buddy was just excited to see you. He loves visitors."

As Spike started to sniff Bobby, Bobby sniffs back. The two were just saying hello. As Bobby finished the sniffing of Spike, he heard Marla say...
1112122121.title: Marla's friend Jenny and her dog Spike

11122.content:
Marla opens the door and sees Bobby's current state. She puts her hands on her hips and cracks a sly smile.

"So you are a Dog day one, huh? I bet you are confused, aren't you Bobby? Can you still talk?" Marla asks.

Worried, he attempts to answer her questions.

"Yes? Oh thank god. What's going on? Why did you ask if I could still speak?"

"Come, Bobby, I'll explain on the way." Marla says.

Bobby walks on his hands and knees behind Marla.

"Bobby, a long time ago, this room was cursed. It is a long story that I'll tell you when you are going to be in a more human state, but the gist of it the curse is that whoever sleeps in that room will transform into something else. It will be different everyday. Tomorrow you could be an animal, or a baby, or an old man, or a girl, or whatever. Everyone else will see you as your transfomation, and you will slowly fit the physical side of the transformation throughout the day, and that is where this room comes in. Sit, Bobby."

You comply and look at the door in front of you.

"In this room is a special mirror, which will allow you to see what you will look like when the physical transformation is complete. Let's take a look, shall we?" Marla opens the door, and you instantly see in the mirror that you will become...

11123.content: Marla enters the room and gets wide eyed. "Whooooaaaaa! Do you really like dogs that much?" I guess she didn't have anything to do with this.... "Um, Aunt Marla, I like animals, but not enough to make my or this room have a theme..." You now truly believe she had nothing to do with any of the room's changes when you see her head lower... You soon feel a little queasy and rush quickly to the bathroom. You made sure to lock the door before hovering over the toilet. All you could think about was the pain that seem to be all over inside your body! Soon your thoughts break as you hear the door knocking and then hear Marla's voice. "Are you ok Bobby?" You tried to talk, but felt as though something was in your mouth making it hard to speak. "Ruui'm finllll (I'm fine)" Marla felt you were catching something, so she called back. "Alright, I'm gonna go make some soup, feel better bobby!!" And with that, Bobby was alone in the bathroom... The pain subsided and now felt as though her mind was in a haze. What is gonna happen?

111232.content:
Bobby's hazy mind didn't allow him to notice that his tongue was now longer and flatter and hanging out the side of his mouth. Bobby licked his lips for a while. He was thirsty.

Bobby looked around the room and saw the toilet. Bobby's hazy mind made him now see the toilet as a large water bowl. Without any hesitation, Bobby crawled over to the toilet and started to lap up the water. As he did this, the next physical transformation begins...

What is Bobby's next transformation?
111232.title: Bobby has physical changes

1112322.content: Bobby felt in the back of his mind that this was the most embarrassing thing he has ever done, but he was overcome with a feeling of happiness... and for no reason at all, just cause he was. Bobby stopped lapping for just a second, feeling his lower area become intensely painful. After a ripping sound comes into focus, a sudden relief hit his mind and continues to lap up the refreshing water. His mind washed more good feelings over him and his tail responded. As Bobby looked back, he noticed he had a tail!!! The sudden shock as well as fear causes the tail to go between his legs for only a moment. As soon as he saw his tail swish between his legs, he felt the need to chase it growing inside of him. He smiled and let his long flat tongue hang to the side... What kind of tail was it?

"Bobby? are you ok?" Bobby froze undecided of what to do. not only could he not stay in the bathroom forever, but at any moment of the day, he could develop paws and have the most hardest time to escape! His conflicting thoughts built up more and more, and unnoticeably he started to make nervous yips and other dog noises... Aunt Marla caught them and knew something was wrong. As she opened the door, Aunt Marla felt herself get all dizzy and faints on the floor. Seeing his aunt on the floor unconscious made the situating feel more real to him than he did a few minutes ago. With all of his might, he tried to get up on two legs, but for some reason he kept getting off balance and fell over every chance. Sighing he walked an all fours over to where his aunt's face was. He looked at her and feelings of sadness built up inside him making him whine a little. Bobby noticed this time, but he didn't care... He didn't know what to do and his now cramping hands would not help him... Bobby sat down the was it was natural for canines, and acted like he hadn't, to focused on his aunt. As another minute or so came by with out her waking up, Bobby started panicking, unaware that patches of golden fur was growing around his newly formed paws. Still siting, bobby leaned over and instinctively sniffed her. He could tell that she was still alive, but he was still very worried. Finally his mind urged him on and he kissed her awake... The way a dog would... As Marla wakes up she....

choices: Bobby's physical transformation finishes as he eats a large bowl of dog food
Bobby's human mind attempts to take over and remind Marla that he was human
1112322211.content:
As Bobby's long dog tongue continued to lick Aunt Marla's face, Marla finally started to stir. Bobby's dog mind was so happy that he started to lick Marla's face even faster.

"What.. OK! OK! Down, Bobby! Down boy! Sit!" Marla started to exclaim.

Bobby stepped back, panted happily and sat in the canine position. Inside, the part of Bobby that was still human was confused. Why wasn't Marla freaking out anymore.

"What the hell happened... Now I remember! I was coming in here to scold you for drinking out of the toilet again! Bad Bobby! Bad Dog!"

Bobby started to whine again. Bobby realized the real reason Marla had fainted. She was transformed to! She now believed you to be a dog!

Marla just smiled.

"Oh, who am I kidding. You are the best dog anybody could possibly have. Yes you are! Yes you are!"

Marla started to scratch Bobby's head, and Bobby returned to panting happily and wagging his tail 100 miles per hour. As he did, golden fur continued to grow all over his body. Bobby was so happy that he once again licked Marla in the face.

"OK, OK boy. If you were so thirsty, why didn't you come up for breakfast?"

"BARK! BARK!" Bobby barked, and he started running upstairs.

"Master is so good to me." Bobby thought. "No, she is not my master! She is Aunt Master, I mean Marla!"

Bobby was so worried. Would he lose his human mind forever?
1112322211.title: Had always remembered Bobby as a dog

choices: Time to go to the park!!
Time to play in the living room!!
11123222111.content:
As Bobby followed his aunt happily wagging his tail, his mind tried to break out and get him to stop acting like he was. If a regular person could truly see Bobby now, they would see a more of a dog with a few human traits. But as they reached the kitchen, Bobby's now baggy clothes was dragging slightly on the floor. Instinctively, he shook himself, and when he was done, he was naked, but no worries, his bottom half now accurately resembling a golden retriever. As he took a few steps forward, he looked back at his now lonely clothes and then turned back. Noooooo!!! Go get those clothes!!! Come on, you need clothes! He thought and Bobby stood there staring... Although his human mind tried to put up a big fight, it was being over powered by another thought that yelled, Dogs don't need clothes Bobby! C'mon, go to your master! My aunt is not my aunt!!! His thoughts kept fighting and he stood still until aunt Marla called. "Come bobby!! Food!" The call of food as well as the smell of it came, Bobby perked his pointier human ears to the call and literally galloped all the way over to where his aunt was. The food was still on the counter and she usually held it there for a while, at least in her mind.When he sat by her feet, he looked up, his body was fully canine, all that was left now was his muzzle, the senses, and the rest of the fur. "You want some food boy? Do ya?!" The word food, made him get all excited and he started barking. "Bark Bark Bark!!!!!" His tail wagged ferociously and actually got up on his hind legs.
As Marla laughed, she knew he had enough of the tease and brought the bowl down. As Bobby stared, he got a little hesitant. His muzzle was almost all the way formed just as his new floppy ears were done and his nose started gaining a new texture. The process was making his nose itch and he brought his paw up to it and tried to get whatever was on it off. He broke focus again as Marla talked. "I know it's not your favorite brand, but I bet it tastes just as good!" As she finished his now fully functional, but furless muzzle started to sprout a few whiskers. When Bobby looked back at his food, he had the instinct over come his mind and learn forward trying to get a good whiff at the food in front of him. He remembered from the few times that he went to the pet store with his friends that it would smell awful. He wondered how dogs ever liked that crap. This time however, was different, as his new senses kicked in, the smell was perceived differently and this smell was way more appealing than he ever would've expected! In a matter of seconds, the dog food was no more and he licked the bowl clean. As Bobby brought his head up, all that was there now was a regular, young adult golden retriever. Although he was wagging his tail happily and smiled a goofy canine smile, the back of his mind finally realized that he was indeed a dog and that he might even stay like this forever... He felt defeated, as this was only the morning and he was already a fully fledged dog. Soon Marla said.

Marla drives Bobby to the park.
111232221111.content:
Bobby just sat on the ground, panting, wagging his tail, wondering what to do next. Marla just smiled at him.

"Well, you've got your meal in, I think it's time we head to the park! You wanna go to the park boy?"

Bobby's dog mind got extremely excited, even more so than before.

"PARK! BALL! FETCH!" Bobby thought.

Bobby's human mind was both worried and relieved by this. Though he knew the park could be trouble for his new instincts, the nice long journey there might be an opportunity to think about how he could get out of this. Or if there was even a way out.

"Park is not for thinking! PARK IS FOR FUN!" Bobby suddenly though.

Was that from his dog mind or his human mind? Were they starting to mix? Bobby needed to try and figure out something fast.

"Bobby, Come!" he heard Marla call from the other room.

Bobby's mind returned to responding to his dog instincts as he headed the call.
111232221111.title: Time to go to the park!!

As Bobby ran into the front room, Marla held a leash and collar.

"You want to go for a WALK Bobby? Huh? I know you do! Now SIT!"

Bobby's dog mind was just too excited to get on this walk, but he heeded Marla's command and sat. Marla put the collar on Bobby first. Bobby couldn't see it, but he would have freaked had been able to see that the collar had a tag with his name on it, and Marla's address as a return. Then, Marla attached the leash to the collar. Bobby wagged his tail hard, but inside the human mind was fighting.

"OK, Bobby. Let's go!"

As Bobby walked out the door, he was trying with all of his might to get his human mind in control.

Bobby makes his first bathroom break as a dog
11123222111112.content: What happens on the walk that puts Bobby's human mind in control?
11123222111112.title: Bobby's dog mind takes over when something ...

111232221111122.content:
The walk to the park would've been rather pleasant if it weren't for the war being waged in Bobby's mind. He heard so many new sounds and smelled so many new smells it was almost overwhelming. His dog mind kept getting so sidetracked with everything that what remained of his human mind had to remind him who he was at least every five minutes.

The first time he felt he was in almost full control, Hydrant! Must smell! Thought his dog mind. His human mind was more powerful though and prevented him from bounding toward the fire hydrant as fast as he could.

Not five minutes passed before Marla and Bobby turned a corner and Bobby found himself face to face with a squirrel. Before his human mind could react he started to bark furiously at the squirrel. Bobby continued to lick Marla in the face until she started to move. Bobby quickly moved back, wagging his tail and panting happily.

Marla sat up and gathered herself, before assessing the situation and remember exactly what had happened.

Marla looked over Bobby and saw the tail, the tongue, the paws, and the patches of golden fur that had started to appear all over his body.

"Oh, Bobby... Bobby, I am so sorry. It had been so long since someone transformed in this house..."

Bobby started barking. He obviously wanted to know more.

"Well, a long time ago.. I refused to let an old woman stay the night. She had told me that she then cursed the house, so that any guest that stayed would have to endure five days of transformation. Of course, I didn't believe her. Until your Uncle Jack stayed over one night and woke up the next morning as a teenage girl with a bimbo personality. After that I tried to prevent anyone from coming, and now... it just slipped my mind. I'm sorry Bobby. I didn't mean for this to happen to you."

Marla looks as if she were about to cry. Bobby started to lick her face again for comfort.

"Hahaha. OK, Bobby. Sit!"

Bobby instantly heeded the command and sat, panting and wagging his tail on the floor.

"Don't worry about reality or whatever. Anyone who comes into contact will believe I've always had a dog named Bobby. Now, why don't we finish up this transformation..."

"Oh Bobby, I don't know why this happens, but almost everyone who sleeps in your room changes." says Marla.
Bobby purrs and rubs his head against her stomach as she scratches under his chin.
"I remember my experiences there. One day I was a bird, the next day I was a business man. One day I was a toddler unable to take care of myself. Once I was me as a little girl, and the last day I was a dog. After the fifth time, I became myself again, and the room never worked on me again."

Bobby jumps off of her lap and starts scratching the table leg. Marla claps loudly, which frightens Bobby. "Bad Bobby!" she says as the cat jumps back embarrassed. Marla picks Bobby up and starts petting him again.

"I thought I dreamed the whole thing. Then one day I invited a traveler to stay in that room. I woke up to get him breakfast and found a stuck up teenage girl there. She thought I was some kind of witch and left. Three days later, she returned, begging me to change back. I let her use the room again, but nothing happened."

Bobby looks up at Marla with his giant eyes.
"Bobby, she never changed back. It's important that you fall asleep in that bed before midnight."

Bobby jumps out of her grasp and runs back to the bed and lays down asleep in it. It's a sign that he understands.

Being a cat had it's advantages when it came to sleeping. Bobby slept for the rest of the day, until the next morning came and he was changed again.

113132212.content:
The first thing that Bobby felt when he woke up is the cold, wooden floor underneath his head. Bobby groaned mentally in frustration, as he tends to fall off his bed during the night when sleeping. The second thing he felt was the sun's bright rays shining into his eyes, forcing them open slowly.

With his vision blurred, Bobby shook his head until his vision became clear. Blinking a few times, Bobby then noticed the situation that he was in. He saw that his surroundings have become MUCH bigger, everything becoming massive around him. Bobby looked up and saw that the average sized bed that he slept in last night now towers above him, with some of the now-massive duvet touching the floor, making a pathway up to the bed. Bobby then looked behind him, and saw that the small space under the bed has become vast and plenty of space.

Then, Bobby noticed something. Last night, Bobby had put his bag under the bed, with it half closed. It appears that the mirror that he brought from him is propped against his giant bag, which he had done last night. But, something seems wrong in the reflection, so Bobby gets up and walked over to the large mirror, feeling a bit funny when walking.

When Bobby finally gets to the mirror, he was shocked. In the reflection, instead of his own, is an ant. A single red ant with suspicious blue eyes stares back at him. Bobby blinks, and sees that the ant blinked as well. Bobby then looked down and saw that his legs and arms have become appendages. Finally, to test if it's not a dream, Bobby touches his face with one of the appendages, and saw that the ant is also touching it's face.

This confirms it. Bobby has turned into an ant, a very small insect. Bobby attempted to scream in horror, but then realises that due to the fact that ants do not have voice boxes, he couldn't scream.
"What on earth happened to me....?" he thought, still unsure why on earth he turned into an ant.

BOOM! BOOM!

A series of loud, consecutive explosions roar through the room, catching ant Bobby off by surprise. Bobby quickly scurries out from out of the bed. What he sees absolutely terrifies him. Something that threatens him in his current form.

The gigantic figure of Aunt Marla is looming above him, completely unaware of her nephew-turned-ant at her feet. Marla walked around Bobby's room in her black-high heels, creating some quiet footsteps from her point of view but booming explosions for Bobby's point of view. Marla's dress is a navy blue, covering her top half of her body and going just above the knees, showing a lot of leg. From a certain angle, Bobby imagined that he could see his aunt's panties, but that's disgusting. There is a low-cut part around her chest area, which shows off her big (now massive, to Bobby's current size) cleavage.

BOOM! BOOM!

Massive Marla then proceeded to walk near the bed, stopping directly above ant Bobby, still completely unaware of her ant-y nephew below, quivering near her gigantic feet.

"BOBBY!" Marla called for him, with some frustration in her voice. Bobby covered his head with his appendages to help block out the noise, as his body flinched at the loud voice. "WHERE ARE YOU?!"

What happens next?
113132212.title: Ant

1131322121.content:
Bobby decided that it was high-time that he should get out of this situation, seeing that Marla could accidentally crush him to death under her gigantic high heels without realizing that he was there or just crushing an ant (which is him) in order to get rid of a pest.

Bobby then sees that past Massive Marla's towering legs is the doorway out of his room, wide open. Maybe if he's quick enough, Bobby could quickly scuttle his ant-y body out of the room before Marla's huge black high heels come crashing down. So, Bobby nods to himself while his monumental aunt notices that a single red ant is in the room.

So, Bobby begins to move when suddenly.....

"HUH?" Bobby freezes in horror, and then looks up to see that Marla is looking down at him, with a blank stare, feet moving a little and creating a lot of noise for Bobby. With the intensity of the star, Bobby moves his ant body back a bit and would be sweating and panicking right now, if ants could sweat. Massive Marla stared at the single red ant with blue eyes for a few seconds.

Then, to Bobby's surprise, instead of gaining a expression of disgust, Marla begins to grin. "AH. THERE YOU ARE, BOBBY!" Marla then goes down on her knees, making sure not to crush Bobby by accident, creating lots of loud noises for Bobby as she shifted her movement. Once on her knees, Massive Marla then extends her giant hands to right in front of Bobby, who looks somewhat confused.

"GO ON, BOBBY. IT'S SAFE." Marla reassured Bobby gently, though still loud for him. Bobby then nods with his ant-y head and crawls onto the large fingers then giant palm of Marla's hand. Marla then brings her hand with Bobby on closer to her face. Bobby backs off a bit in surprise of Marla's enormous face, though the gentle smile puts his worries to ease.

"NOW, YOU'RE WONDERING WHAT ON EARTH IS HAPPENING, RIGHT?" Marla whispered, quieting her voice for Bobby, though it was loud to him as normal shouting. Ant Bobby then nods, as he cannot speak. Marla then frowns, as she was expecting him to reply.

"OH YEAH, YOU'RE AN ANT. ANTS CAN'T TALK...." Marla remarks quietly. She then shook her head. "Well...." she went, even quieter for Bobby's sake. "What happened to you is actually quite easy to explain."

Bobby turned his ant head slightly in confusion. "This house....has a particular curse on it. Anyone who stays here during the weekdays as a guest are subjected to this curse." Marla explained simply, smiling a little. "They go through transformation." Bobby is taken aback by this, though it is hard to read an ant's emotions.

"The guest must go through a certain amount of days of transformation, depending on what day they start to stay. They must be asleep for the transformation to begin and when they wake up, the transformation will be completed." Marla continues to explain. "The guest returns back to normal on the weekdays, but will begin to transform again once they are asleep and the clock becomes midnight. Since you arrived on a Sunday, you have to go through five days of transformation, I guess?"

Marla then points one of her large fingers at Bobby. "The transformation can be anything. Today, you're an ant, which is quite surprising since that's never happened to a guest before. The next day, you could be anything. You could be an object, a different size, an animal, a body part, be yourself but extremely older, become a new person or switch your gender. Understand?" Bobby then nods to response to that. Then he sees Marla frown seriously, worrying a little.

"However, if you fall asleep when you are out of my house when transformed, you will be in that form, permanently, even if you return to the house. You must not fall asleep, got it?" Bobby nods once again, though nervously. Marla then grins, showing her titanic teeth off. "But don't worry, I won't let that happen to my little 'ant-y' nephew! I am your 'ant', after all! Ha!"

Bobby then points at Marla, confused on how the curse hasn't effect her. She somehow knew what he meant. "How am I not affected? Well, after a while, the curse recognizes that you live here and doesn't effect you. Believe me, I've had some weird experiences when I was transformed! Though, a part of the curse states that the owners of the house must transform along with guests when they stay, thought a lot less harsh. Don't I look different to you?"

When Marla pointed that out, Bobby then had a good look at her. It was true, she transformed as well. It appears that her body age had gone down a lot. Instead of a 52 year old woman with greying hair, Marla now looks like she's twenty two years old with an amazing figure, stunning looks and fiery red hair. Bobby then nodded, causing Marla to grin. She then, with her other hand, gently picked off ant Bobby. Though panicking a little, Bobby then was put on her shoulder, which she then looked at him and smiled.

"Hold on tight! It's going be a rough ride!" Marla then gets up off her knees, with Bobby hold on tight on her dress. Massive Marla then walked out of Bobby's room, with ant Bobby holding on for dear life.

What happens next?
1131322121.title: Marla looks down

Maybe tomorrow, he'll hopefully be human again and ask more about the curse, but for now, he's just an ant riding on his aunt.

1211311.content:
"Oh it CAN be, sometimes its quite fun. Perhaps I should start from the beginning. You see, as you might have noticed the house has a spell on it, or rather a curse. Once long ago my family angered a sorceress who cursed us for all time. Whenever someone sleeps in a bed my family owns, they will wake up transformed in some way. My tried and succeeded to make peace with the sorceress but she was unable to completely remove her spell. So instead she modified it so that it would only occur one week each year. I didn't warn you because quite frankly I doubted you would believe me. Now there are a few other things about our curse you need to know," she paused to makes sure bobby was listening.

         "First of all you can't tell anyone you are under a spell unless they already know it, and as far as anyone who knows you is concerned they will believe you have always been like this. Their relationship with you won't even change dramatically, your friends will still be your friends, although when it comes to those who love you things can get a bit confused. For example if you have a girlfriend she will now love you like a little brother, instead of as a romantic partner because you are an eight year old. Everyone will treat you as an eight year old, because to them you are," she stopped for a moment to let the information sink in.

          Second sleep drives the transformation, when you fall asleep in a bed in this house you will transform in a semi-random way, generally feeding on hidden sub-conscience desires. Evidently some of yours revolve around becoming younger. However falling asleep at night is not the only way to trigger the transformation. Once begun anytime you fall asleep today the transformation could trigger again evolving further. Since we know your transformation is centered around getting younger any number of things could occur. You might get younger physically, or mentally. Or maybe you'll wake up wearing diapers and completely incontinent. I can't be certain. Tomorrow could focus on these desires or new ones, there's no way to be absolutely sure. But you have to makes sure that on the last day of this week you sleep in this house, or what ever transformations you have undergone will become permanent. You may or may not return to your proper age tomorrow morning," she finished and sighing, sat down. It was then that you finally noticed the changes to your Aunt, she had also become younger, although her regression left her in in late twenties, and quite beautiful.

         Bobby looked down at his now eight-year-old body and marveled. Magic was REAL! So many possibilities. "Maybe this isn't so bad," Bobby thought to himself. After all his Aunt was right, he secretly did desire to be younger, and maybe some time as a kid, even a toddler would be fun, he wanted a vacation from peer pressure and expectations and responsibility. He was quickly warming up to the idea. "What should we do now," Aunt Marla said brightening, "Do you want some pancakes?" "Pancakes!" Bobby shouted childishly smiling. Chuckling Marla said "I'll take that as a yes."

The two continued into the kitchen and Marla whipped up some of her famous pancakes, slapping three big ones down onto bobby's plate. He looked at them in awe, there were many perks to being younger again for sure. Bobby quickly began making a pig of himself. As the two ate, Bobby made quite a mess, eating like a real eight-year-old. He yawns as he finishes his large meal, and thinks about taking a nap, maybe a descent into toddler hood wouldn't be so bad. He remarked this to his aunt, and she replied "Well, its certainly your choice, but be absolutely sure, there's no way to undo what ever happens until the end of the week."

Bobby yawned again, and decided he would risk it. He climbed back into his bed and and in moments fell back asleep. Hidden beneath his blankets Bobby began to change again, but how?

"Oh I see you noticed your transformation," Marla said as she entered Bobby's room.

"Why did I twansform?" Bobby asked, before clasping his hands over his mouth. He was shocked at how juvenile he sounded.

"This house is cursed," Marla explained. "Anyone who sleeps here, other than myself and your uncle, will be transformed during the night. The effects wear off when you sleep overnight somewhere else."

Bobby began to pout. He did not like the prospect of being a little kid the entire day; nor did he like the prospect of transforming into something else overnight.

Despite Bobby's protests, Marla helped him get dressed for the day. Even though he was a teenager, he was pouting and acting like a small child. His biggest tantrum arose when Marla produced a pair of pull-ups from his suitcase.

"Your clothes will also transform to match your body," Marla added. "You need to wear these pull-ups because apparently you're not fully potty trained yet."

"No," Bobby stamped his foot on the ground and crossed his arms. "I'm a big boy."

The next ten minutes was a struggle as Marla forced Bobby into the pull-ups. Bobby only relented when Marla gave him a firm smack to the behind. The swat stung and Bobby became more docile and allowed Marla to finish dressing him.

"Try to look on the bright side of this, you're going to get to experience things that most people will never get to," Marla said. "I think we should go out today and you should enjoy being a three year-old again."

"But people will see me," Bobby protested.

"Of course they will," Marla cooed. "They'll see a cute little boy who is spending the day with his aunt. I can't leave you at home, so you'll have to come with me when I run errands. Even if you don't want to do anything fun today, I still have errands that need to be run."

12131211122122.content:
You blink blearily. You feel fogged, but the moment you feel wet, you start awake screaming. All that comes out is a baby's high pitched wail.

"There, there, dear. You fell fast asleep at the mall."

Aunt appears over you, towering like a giant. But she doesn't look the same. She looks younger, a young woman even, fully breasted as well.

"This time the magic's gone further than I've ever seen it. You changed while you napped. You can't be more than a few weeks old at best. And look at me. I haven't looked this good in years! And the house," She picks you up as if you weigh nothing. "The house has given me so much! Baby toys. A rocker. A baby swing. A pantry of diapers, wipes, a dresser full of clothes, a crib in your room, and this changing table."

She settled you down on it as she said the words.

"I don't want you to be worried. . . . No stay still, child. You're no teenager. You're a newborn." At first you tried to move, but she laid her hand on you.

"Like I said, don't worry. I've never seen things change so much, but its never gone beyond five days." You barely hear her whisper, "in my memory."

Your eyes go wide.

You feel exposed on the changing table, but more than anything you want to be clean. After the diapering she reaches for jammies. These ones have no legs! "Sorry, but you don't need footies yet. to until you walk. And these make it so much easier to change in the night."

As she leans you against her breast, she speaks. You can barely pay attention. You feel drawn to feed. You here something about reading a book and curiosity as to why she could only find sleep bags in green and pink.

The night was filled with dreaming of swimming, of feeding, of warm places. You blink thinking what a strange dream it really was, when you see the bars of the crib.

"Wah!" You let out a terrible scream! "Wah!"

Nothing changed! How could that happen! This had to be the same room you slept in overnight!

"I'm coming, little one. I'm coming." Your aunt came in. She looked tired, but remarkably good for someone who was supposed to be a senior citizen.

"You're crying. You know how many times I was up last night?" You realize they weren't dreams and turn a shade of red.

"No worries Bobby." You feel more relaxed in her arms. "Breakfast in a moment. First a change."

You don't fight it. "I can do this," you think. "I can lie here like a baby."

"It's strange nothing's changed," she says. The house has never done this." She's talking to you as she takes off the sleep sack and reaches for a new diaper. "If anything, I think my breasts feel more sensitive! Now, no peeing in my face." She opened your sipper and leaned back to avoid spray. It didn't come. She leaned forward. Without a word she changed you and reached for a change of clothes. Seemed pretty frilly.

She didn't say a word until you were drinking deeply from her breast.

"Bobby, something did change. Today, you are my little girl."

Aunt Marie is a bit older again, but out of breath from rushing. "Brandi. there's something I need to tell you."

I've seen some wild changes, but things always go back to normal, but this isn't just about you. This note is from Mama M's Midwives. Your midwife thought you'd deliver last week or this. She's drop everything when you call."

She came closer and lowered her voice, as you clutched your enormous abdomen. This just couldn't be happening!

"Brandi, there's nothing left is there? It's your body preparing to do what it needs. You can do this. You're a healthy adult woman."

No. No. No. No.

You don't bother getting out of your robe. You don't know what you'd wear anyways.

After what seems to be an eternity you hear Aunt Marie greet someone at the door.

"I came as quickly as I could. I expected it around this time, but I'll examine her just to make certain."

Aunt Marie leads her to the living room. The midwife is a middle aged woman, very professional appearance. She sits in the chair by you and puts on gloves as she pulls out a stethoscope. She invites you to open your open. At first you're resistent. You've never felt so vulnerable, so naked.

"No. Can't we wait? Isn't there something I can take? I can't do this." Your voice becomes more hysterical.

Aunt Marie takes your hand.

The midwife takes a very comforting tone, "Now, Brandi, we've prepared for this. Within half an hour the rest of your team will be here. Within two or three hours I expect we'll have a baby. I think you said it was a boy. Have you thought of any names."

With your hand in hers, you walk into the guest room, where you see
12131211122122212111211.title: Coming. And Coming Soon

121312111221222121112112.content:
You go into the small bedroom. The midwife is there, as well as your Aunt.

You're aching all over and take position with the help of your midwife. Your aunt takes your hand.

"I don't want to do this. I shouldn't have to do this."

"I know Brandi. You'll be fine. We'll be fine."

Pain unlike anything you'd ever known seized your womb. You strain as your breath in and out, pushing every time they say. When will it be over?

It is the most emotionally and physically exhausting experience of your life. You can't believe when you finally hear a baby's cry, at which point you begin to cry. It was over. It was over.

"I just want things to go back the way they were before."

Your aunt wipes your brow as the midwives clean and bundle the baby.

"A very healthy boy you have there."

Still crying you take the baby in your arms, and another emotion, an unexpected emotion, takes your heart. You wanted nothing but to escape this day. You only wanted the pain to be over, to get back to your old life, but now there was this child. You felt love.

You spend the next several hours getting comfortable with "Bobby." They insisted on a name. Paperwork was done, and you and Aunt Marie spent the evening alone and warm with this new life you delivered.

You sob as your heart is torn in two for your old life and this new life feeding at your breast. What will happen when you wake up the next morning?
121312111221222121112112.title: A Snug Bedroom

1213121112212221211121122.content:
You wake up slowly. The night was difficult. You dreamed about your old life, your life before, but it was different, in little ways you couldn't quite understand. All the time your heart, and breast, ached for your child. The new life you brought into the world. With you it wouldn't ever be.

As your eyes open you see your school bag, with clothes coming out of it. Bobby was gone.

To your surprise you begin to sob. To your greater surprise it doesn't sound like you at all.

You sit up and long brown hair falls in front of your face. Looking down you see a sport jersey, just you had before, but it fits a lot looser. You look underneath and find two round breasts. Your arms are athletic. You jump to the floor and tear open your bag. IT's all teen clothes, like yours, but for a girl.

You hear Aunt Marie call, "Brandi."

As she does it's as if you can remember two lives. Your old life, and the life of this teenage girl. It was as if you'd been born a girl all along. You remember the princess parties, your bff's, your first period, your girl sports teams.

"Brandi. Breakfast time."

You pull on some clothes and put your hair up, as if you'd done it a thousand times before.

"Coming."

But there was something else. Something that made you sad.

"I know, Brandi. I'm sorry. Wasn't it worse when you were a baby. But you're back to normal now." She gave you a hug. "I think the house was just preparing you for what's coming." When she said that she rest her hand on your womb.

Marla helped Bobby change into dry clothes upon their return. She was quite insistent that he wear a pull-up, so as to avoid any further accidents. Bobby reluctantly agreed. He had come to recognize that his mind was no longer what it once was.

"And I thought that maybe afterwards, we could go swimming in the lake. I picked out a really nice polka dot bikini to wear. And get this- I booked us on a yacht today. We're going on a three hour tour of the area!".

"A three hour tour? Like Gilligan's Island?" was all Bobby could say under the circumstances, to which Marla playfully threw a piece of bacon at his face.

"Only if I can be Ginger" she grinned.

"And when we're done" said Marla playfully once again, I thought that we could take a hike to the top of this one mountain peak. It's got the best view of the stars ever, I've been told. Then again, YOU should know, honey. You're the one that said we should live in the country, remember?"

Bobby relunctantly shook his head, to which Marla grinned happily.

"It's a date!" she yelled, suddenly getting up. "I'm gonna pack our stuff. Be ready in a half hour!" she said in a sing songy voice, almost skipping away upstairs.

Bobby sat at the table in shock, and then stared at the eternally happy German Shepard that was supposedly his Uncle Jack.

"What am I gonna do?" he bemoaned, resting his face in his arms.

Bobby suddenly felt a licking on his arm. He looked down to see Jack licking his arm, tying to comfort him.

"Thanks, Uncle Jack. If you're still in there somewhere. Here, want some bacon?" Bobby said. He grabbed a piece of bacon and let Jack take it straight from his hand. Jack chomped on the bacon and wagged his tail.

As Bobby looked back up, something caught his eye. It was a spoon, nice and clean and shiny, and producing a reflection. He almost did a double take at what he saw. It was a face. A face that wasn't his. The spoon wasn't the greatest mirror in the world, but it was clear that the face being reflected inside of it wasn't his young teenage face.

Bobby rushed up from his chair and ran into the closet bathroom. He hesitated to look in the mirror, but he decided he needed to confirm his suspicion. He looked into the mirror.

And saw a 40 year old man staring back. The man staring back was slightly muscular, with a mostly black head of hair, some greys poking out, and a goatee. He looked rather handsome, actually, but he also possessed clear wrinkles. Bobby raised his arm, and the mirror raised its arm too. He touched his face. The reflection did the same.

"I'm... I'm actually Marla's husband?" Bobby said to himself. "What... what the hell happened?"

Bobby thought to himself. There had to be some sort of clue. Something that would tell him why this happened. Or at least something that he could use to prove he's supposed to be a nephew and not a husband!

Bobby hastily found Jack's dog collar and took him out back, promising Marla that he'd be back in twenty minutes.

“Don't be late, honey” said Marla sweetly, kissing Bobby on the lips as he walked out the rear door.

“I...won't” said the teenager as he turned his face from his aunt to wrinkle his nose.

Bobby walked off into the wilderness surrounding the house. He was somewhat familiar with it, as he was an outdoorsy kind of kid, and whenever he had visited Aunt Marla and Uncle Jack in the past, he was allowed to wander around the woods, albeit while supervised. Nevertheless, there was this one small pond about a half mile from the house that he was leading the queer German Shepard to in hopes of finding answers. To his credit, Jack the dog was himself in a hurry, and Bobby had to walk at a brisker pace than he was used to in order to keep up with him.

“Made it” said the bewildered teenage boy somewhat out of breath. He had reached the pond. He walked over to it to look at his reflection, and he still saw the same middle aged man. He sighed. The man in the reflection, whom Aunt Marla thought was her loving husband, was pretty handsome in an older John Stamos kind of way, but he was still ticked off and squicked out by all of this!! He didn't want to lose over twenty years of his life, he he certainly didn't want to be hitched up to his own aunt!

He turned towards Jack who was behind him, wagging his tail and sticking his tongue out.

“Come here boy!” shouted Bobby playfully, beckoning the German Shepard to come padding over towards the water, and to his credit, Jack did. Bobby looked in the water's reflection and gasped.

Bobby's first instincts were to immediately back away. He was grossed out seeing Aunt Marla in her bra and underwear, let alone this dumbfounding day he was having, as if the world were conspiring to force Bobby into a role he was never meant for. He tried with all of his mental might to resist the urge to give into sinful incest, but he found that the more he resisted, the more the magic, or whatever it was that was doing this, was compelling him to return Marla's passionate embrace even harder and more salaciously upon her soft lips. The feeling of Aunt Marla's tongue inside his mouth and the sound of her moaning was turning him on. It was at that moment when Bobby start to experience flashbacks, vivid memories that he had no business recollecting.

*Flashback*

He visualized himself as a young man of twenty-one, about five years older than Bobby was now. His black hair was longer, but styled like Luke Perry. Looking around, he was on top of a motorcycle, awaiting the red light to turn green in some part of town he was unfamiliar with. He turned his head right and sees a teenage Aunt Marla as she was walking home with her girlfriends, laughing endlessly about some idle gossip session they were having. The Clueless inspired fashion of their clothes indicated that this was a good twenty years ago. At that exact right moment, like kismet, the young blonde girl turns her head left and sees the hunk in the leather jacket riding the chopper. Bobby sees young Marla's lecherous Lolita eyes undressing him. With the roar of the engine, Bobby flies past them as the light turned, realizing that he'll have to wait a few years.

The genuine part of Bobby was growing more and more confused. The actual Bobby hated this, wished that this was all a dream that he desperately wanted to wake up from. The phantom Bobby, however, the one who was really forty years old and married, was beginning to have an erection, daydreaming about the first time he met Marla in person.

More memories flooded into his head. It was three years later, the year 1999. Bobby was now 24, just at the end of his college life, trying to figure out the exact nature of what he could do his in his life. He still had that cool leather jacket persona, but it was just slightly more mature now. Through his college life he had also really gotten into movies and creative thoughts, and he was trying to find an outlet for that passion as well.

One fateful day, Bobby was waltzing through campus, listening to, of all things, Prince's 1999 on his walkman. As he walked through campus, he caught something through his sunglasses.

It was her. It was Marla.

Who would have thought that that girl he saw one day while riding his motorcycle through town three years ago would be going to the same college as him? And who would have thought that he would be running into her on a random walk through the campus. He couldn't waste this chance. His adult life was ahead of him. And this was the start.

He strutted up, cool as ever, and gave her a look. That look. The look that made the girls melt. Marla was no exception. She had a distant memory of the cool older guy that looked at her from a motorcycle some time ago. And now he was here, in front of her. And she melted.

There was no doubt from that first moment that they were gonna be soulmates. They dined that night, they went and saw The Matrix, they returned to her apartment, and did not hesitate to make sweet, sweet love.
